name: The Greatest Dating Sim Ever!
description:
Are you a lonely horse trotting about this lonely world being alone and lonely??

Well look no further!! This is the GREATEST dating sim ever!

Lucky you- there are two GORGEOUS people to date, Martha Soupert and Dwayne "The Human" Johnson!

Find love- or perish! <3

***THERE MAY OR MAY NOT  BE A SUPER SECRET SUPER SEXY THIRD DATE WAITING FOR YOU BEHIND DOOR NUMBER THREE***

Controls: Enter/Space/Left Click- ok

Right Click/Esc- menu/deny/delete

~Made with RPG Maker MV~
